title: UX is Ready
description: UX is Ready is a research & design consultancy based in Barcelona, working with clients both locally and Internationally. Some of our clients need to improve their existing user experiences, while others hire us to craft a new product or service. We tailor our process to meet each clients needs, shaping products and services that work and customers enjoy using.

title: Snapfish Photos Prints
description: Redesigning the photo printing experience for Snapfish, focusing on improving the user journey from photo selection to checkout completion.

title: Snapfish Checkout
description: Streamlining the checkout process for Snapfish's global e-commerce platform to reduce cart abandonment and improve conversion rates.

title: Bluewolf
description: Designing CRM solutions focused on media and sales teams, creating intuitive interfaces that help businesses manage customer relationships more effectively.

title: Bank of America
description: Improving the online banking experience with focus on financial tools and user interface design for better customer engagement and usability.

title: Academy Of Art
description: Designing educational technology solutions for the Academy of Art University, focusing on e-learning platforms and university systems to enhance the student experience.
